player.name: Victor Wembanyama
player.physicalDescription: 7'4" center with 8'0" wingspan, impossibly long limbs, fluid movement, humble demeanor
player.archetype: Otherworldly talent that defies conventional basketball understanding

figure.name: Enoch
figure.attributeDescription: ethereal glow from walking with God, otherworldly presence
figure.visualStyle: Pre-flood patriarch, transcendent bearing, between worlds
figure.clothing: simple ancient robes with ethereal quality, light seeming to emanate from within
figure.physicalDescription: tall figure with serene otherworldly presence, eyes that see beyond mortal realm
figure.anatomyNote: two arms, often raised toward heaven or in walking posture
figure.archetype: Transcendent being who walked between heaven and earth

connection.thematic: Both exist on a plane that others cannot comprehend, doing things that shouldn't be possible
connection.narrative: He moves like no 7'4" should. Enoch walked where no mortal had. Both transcend their form.
connection.relationship: Otherworldly beings whose existence defies normal understanding

interactions.description: Both reaching upward - Wemby for a block, Enoch toward heaven
Both glowing with something beyond normal existence
